name: bun-redis-socket
description: A Bun project made for portraying the concepts of load balancing ready application for sockets interaction along with http requests.

name: wisestep-link-shortner
description: A full stack java Link shortner project made with Spring Reactive Web, Spring boot, MongoDB and React Js

name: box-office-app
description: A progressive Web Application(PWA) made with React Js, which shows the latest movies and tv shows details from a public API using axios.

name: assistance-ticket-system
description: A project to handle tickets regarding the assistance for any organization using the web application. It uses NoSql MongoDB for database storage and mongoose for database management and Tailwind CSS for design and entire development is done using Next.js.

name: next-cars
description: Next Js Project for showcasing a Car Showcase website using Tailwind CSS, Rapid API, Headless UI, and the features available in Next JS.

name: ML-Unsupervised-Netflix-Clustering-Recommendation-Project
description: A machine learning pipeline project that uses unsupervised learning to cluster the movies and tv shows from the Netflix dataset and recommend the similar movies and tv shows based on the clustering.
